project_descr: Mercury, one of the world's most ubiquitous heavy metal neurotoxic ants, has been an integral part of many medical devices, most prominently thermometers and sphygmomanometers.

outputs.output_descr: Reducing Unintended Persistent Organic Pollutants (UPOPs) and Mercury Releases from the Health Sector in Africa.
